text:
Team Building Activities with Bubble Soccer at Boink Boink
Boink Boink offers bubble soccer fun games, which is a great way to build teamwork, friendship and character within any organization.
Singapore, Singapore, October 22, 2015 --( PR.com )-- The trend towards team building in workplaces has proliferated over the past decade. And many still don't understand the importance of team building. Many of the people who lead these teams will have previously been supervisors of traditional work groups. They must understand that to succeed in their new roles as team leaders, they have to rethink their concepts of leadership. Team leaders must first understand the necessity of team building activities and how it helps their team. To help those, Boink Boink has introduced a fun filled game to add in the team building activities.
Bubble Soccer is a unique form of soccer that sees players being encased in an inflated human-sized plastic ball. Players then engage in a game of soccer, while being inside these plastic bubbles. It sounds easy, but requires a lot of energy. Boink Boink with its motto Bump and Run stands for one thing - FUN is a perfect destination for bubble soccer lovers. "The best team building activity can become the worst team-building experience when there is no clear objective and fun. If all you want is to have some fun and kill some time, play a bump game and enjoy. That is when we came up with Boink Boink," stated the owner.
Boink Boink helps companies to plan team building activities and applies for government grants that will help with costs. They also plan everything from team building games for adults to children's parties to celebrations for free and help clients with catering. Each package comes with a complimentary 1-minute video that clients can take home and laugh over.
"We are so intent on everyone bonding as team while having fun that we even throw in freebies with packages. We are a Bizsafe company and all our bubbles are made out of TPU (Thermoplastic polyurethane) and are environmentally safe," concluded the owner.
"Seriously, there is just something about people running about in giant bubbles, bumping into each other and falling over. That is simply hilarious," commented a fun loving client.
About Company
Boink Boink is a leading bubble soccer specialist for team building games, kids' party and birthday parties. To know more, visit http://www.boinkboink.sg/
